name: AUParameterNode
desc: An AUParameterNode object represents a node in an audio unit’s parameter tree. Nodes are instances of either an AUParameter or AUParameterGroup class.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: A non-localized, permanent name for the parameter node.

items.name: var keyPath: String
items.desc: A key path generated by concatenating the identifiers of the parameter and its parents.

items.name: var displayName: String
items.desc: A localized display name for the parameter node.

items.name: func displayName(withLength: Int) -> String
items.desc: Another version of the display name, possibly truncated to a desired length.

items.name: func token(byAddingParameterObserver: AUParameterObserver) -> AUParameterObserverToken
items.desc: Adds an observer for a single parameter or all parameters in a group.

items.name: func token(byAddingParameterRecordingObserver: AUParameterRecordingObserver) -> AUParameterObserverToken
items.desc: Adds a recording observer for a single parameter or all parameters in a group.

items.name: var implementorValueObserver: AUImplementorValueObserver
items.desc: The callback for parameter value changes.

items.name: var implementorValueProvider: AUImplementorValueProvider
items.desc: The callback for refreshing known stale values in a parameter tree.

items.name: var implementorStringFromValueCallback: AUImplementorStringFromValueCallback
items.desc: The callback for providing a string representation of a parameter value.

items.name: var implementorValueFromStringCallback: AUImplementorValueFromStringCallback
items.desc: The callback for converting a string to a parameter value.

items.name: var implementorDisplayNameWithLengthCallback: AUImplementorDisplayNameWithLengthCallback
items.desc: The callback for obtaining an abbreviated version of a parameter node display name.

items.name: typealias AUParameterObserver
items.desc: A block called after the value of a parameter changes.

items.name: typealias AUParameterRecordingObserver
items.desc: A block called to record parameter changes as automation events.

items.name: typealias AUImplementorValueObserver
items.desc: A block called to notify the audio unit implementation of changes to a parameter value.

items.name: typealias AUImplementorValueProvider
items.desc: A block called to fetch a parameter’s current value from the audio unit implementation.

items.name: typealias AUImplementorStringFromValueCallback
items.desc: A block called to convert a parameter value to a string representation.

items.name: typealias AUImplementorValueFromStringCallback
items.desc: A block called to convert a string to a parameter value.

items.name: typealias AUImplementorDisplayNameWithLengthCallback
items.desc: A block called to obtain a parameter node’s display name, possibly truncated to a desired length.
